reviews.author: Korean Language Teacher
reviews.quote: I can manage lessons tailored to migrant students’ language, level, and starting time, making it very useful for my classes.

reviews.author: Foreign Student in Korea
reviews.quote: I wanted to speak Korean well, but studying was boring. It’s more fun than books, so I recommend it to my friends.

reviews.author: Migrant Parent with Teenage Children
reviews.quote: After immigrating to Korea, there were no Korean language schools or centers nearby, so I worried about my child’s school and social adjustment. Studying with Haru Hangeul has noticeably improved their skills.

reviews.author: Anyone Learning Korean as a Hobby
reviews.quote: Language schools are too expensive, and self-study felt overwhelming. I tried various methods, but Haru Hangeul combines the benefits of books and online courses, making it great for beginners learning Korean on their own.

faq.q: How can I learn in other languages?
faq.a:
Haru Hangeul currently supports English, Chinese, Vietnamese, and Russian.
Other languages will be added based on user requests. Follow Haru Hangeul on Instagram (@haru_hangeul) for updates.

faq.q: How do I get a refund?
faq.a: Payments for Haru Hangeul are processed via the App Store or Google Play Store, and refunds follow their policies. Please contact the App Store or Google Play Store support for refund requests.

Yes, Haru Hangeul is provided free without ads. If you enjoy Haru Hangeul, please recommend it to friends. Donations help us provide more features and content.
Donation link: https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/SG466C5KKQQJW

Haru Hangeul collaborates with Korean education institutions to provide certification. Certified institutions can use the official Haru Hangeul certification mark and receive educational materials and support.

faq.q: How can I join as a partner institution?
faq.a:
To join as a partner institution, you can request via Haru Hangeul's email. Once approved, you'll be registered and receive the certification mark and support.
Haru Hangeul email: haru_admin@haruhangeul.com
